website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price per pound for a dry dog food that enhances endurance. Made by one of the most popular brands in pet food on the market today.
pros: Recipe allows medium-sized dogs to maintain endurance during exercise time
Uses a 30% protein mix to deliver hunger suppression and lean muscle development
Includes glucosamine in the formula to encourage healthy joints
cons: Occasional quality control issues in packaging

website_summaries.verdict: Quality high-protein food by a brand that's been trusted among pet owners for generations.
pros: Formulated with 30% protein and 20% fat, a ratio that's beneficial for active dogs and promotes strong muscles and bones
Contains omega fatty acids for improved skin and coat, and glucosamine that supports bones and joints
cons: Most dogs like it, but some had no interest in eating it
A few reports of bags with stale kibble upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Smells like spoiled milk- not normal.
customer_reviews.text: I normally get this food from Petsmart. My dogs have done really well on it. I signed up to get this food delivered, when i received my first bag, its smelled abnormal- sour or spoiled. I only knew that because Ive been buying this food for about a year now and it has never smelt like that. I hope these food bags are being stored correctly. I checked the expiration date and it was good. I don't know why it smells like spoiled milk!!!! Im going to give the subscription ONE more try, but if it smells spoiled again, I will end my subscription. Ive already lost money because Im scared to feed my dogs spoiled smelling food.
customer_reviews.author: alkane

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I never learn my lesson! Do not buy dog food over Amazon. Many times food companies do not authorize the sale of their food through Amazon and people have reported getting knock off bags. This gave my puppy explosive diarrhea (and he has had this food before just fine!) I'd say it's not to be trusted. And you can not even return it either. Stick with Chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff-- High calorie, high quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this stuff for years for my VERY active boxer. It has higher calories than regular dog food and helps me maintain her weight, especially in the winter when its cold outside and she burns more calories trying to stay warm. Her vert told me to use food for senior dogs but that food just didn't have the calories she needed. During the winter, to maintain her weight (and even pack a couple extra pounds on her), I add a powdered weight gainer for dogs (check out MVP K9 Supplements Formula Weight Gainer for Dogs at  and she is the healthiest weight she's ever had this year.
customer_reviews.author: sandalwood217

customer_reviews.title: The bees knees...
customer_reviews.text: Dog was overweight and itchy with flaky skin. Coat is shiny, better body condition. She took right to it..so long Pedigree! UPDATE: Aug 2018. Tried Beneful Salmon, bad move. My APBT blew her coat on it and had flaky skin again. Lesson learned, will be buying only this from now on! UPDATE #2: March 2019 Still the best kibble for my APBT.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very good food at a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Our breeder now uses this blend exclusively for her champion goldens and their pups. Were it not for the fact that we can readily obtain Annamaet at a fair price, we would have no problems feeding this until senior stage. It is a protein-rich, quality food. At the larger bag price, it is a great value. A 30/20 blend like this one is energy packed. Great for pups, hard-working and sporting adults, and many more energetic smaller breeds. But unless you have a hard-working animal, something a little less rich might be more appropriate for a larger breed senior (especially those that enjoy laying around in retirement) .
customer_reviews.author: M. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size bag. The exact same food type the breeder provided. I will use it for their entire life. Now I have to find the wet kind. 8/29/17 UPDATE - Bought the third bag. They are growing at a rapid rate and going through the food just as fast. Must love it. 10/24/17 UPDATE - Bought a 4th bag. They eat this bland no tasting [yes I TRIED IT! blaarrgh!] I really won't change their diet and they are rapidly reaching a larger athletic size. They really love this stuff. I am just keeping their vittles vault on full. 12/10/17-another bag received.
customer_reviews.author: ShinMadman3rd

customer_reviews.title: Good for all stages and working dogs
customer_reviews.text: All of the dogs are maintaining weight well. Feeding amounts are reasonable, we're not having to feed excessive amounts to any of the dogs including the working dogs and nursing mothers. Puppies start on it really easily (ground and milk, water, and yogurt added for a gruel). The coats are good, but not quite as nice as I would like. Stools are firm, but some of the dogs have become coprophagic since starting on it. Overall, I think the best food in its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Ward mscedarswampretrievers

customer_reviews.title: Terrible first experience I had spoiled food delivered.
customer_reviews.text: This was my 1st time buying Purina Pro Plan Sport 30/20 and I was unlucky enough to receive a rancid package. I keep the food in a plastic container so I didn't notice the awful smell the first time feeding my dog until the next day that he didn't want to eat anything, started throwing up and acting lethargic. I stopped feeding it to him immediately. It's been 4 days of having him on rice and plain chicken and my pal is back to normal. The food smells like rotting fish with a very strong penetrating smell. I guess I'm going back to Wellness Core my bud is nearly 10 he doesn't need these bad adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food but most of all it doesn’t cause DCM
customer_reviews.text: I switched my dogs to this food because of diet related DCM from boutique food manufacturers and grain free diets that appear to be causing DCM in many many dogs. Although they aren’t sure they think too many legumes and pulses are the issue. That being said I switched my dogs 3 months ago to this food. My dogs love it. Like it’s dog crack or something. But their coats are now so shiny and sift and their breath is better and they are both much more active and happy. I can’t say the food makes them happier but it sure seems like they have been happier since I switched them.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this food for a few months now, the bag they sent us started giving my dog superficial skin cysts. It's the only thing different in their routine. Something must have been contaminated in this bag. I won't be purhcasing this from Amazon any more.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Dog had a reaction to food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after extensive research and I wanted to get off grain free food. They dogs like it, but one of them developed a bad rash all over his body. The vet suspected it was the food and we took him off. Your dog may not have an issue, but just thought I would put out a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Katz5

customer_reviews.title: Be careful on the smell of the dog food!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this food for our dog for almost 3 years. Can’t remember when but since a few bags back we started noticing weird smells and our dog started disliking it. At first we didn’t think much but later realized the food may not have been stored properly and went bad. Caused some troubles to our dogs digestive system. Luckily after we changed to a different type under the same brand but not from amazon, our dog went back to normal. Return it if the dog food smells weird/bad/too strong! And we can’t find expiration date on the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Yuxin Qiu

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food, worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this food for my husky puppy he’s 3 months old, started him on ol’ roy puppy food, which was garbage, he had diarrhea really bad, knew he needed to be switched asap, so I bought a small bag of purina one to last him til I could order this, he did alright with that, no longer had diarrhea, instead he puked and had really bad gas, but on this he doesn’t poop too much, he doesn’t have any gas, he hasn’t puked and it seems to last a while, I have it in an auto feeder and have only filled it twice so far, the rest is in a storage container and it’s half full!
customer_reviews.author: K39zie

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food for healthy lean active 1.5 yo pitbull mix
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really ask my dog what she thinks about flavor and scent but she seems to really enjoy it! This has been the only dog food I have fed my dog that doesn’t give her the runs occasionally like other dog food brands. Her coat looks great and she’s happy, healthy and muscularly lean looking. When summer roles around and I go more strenuous hikes I plan to go up to the 30/20 type so her body can be fully fueled for a full day of hiking. My vet and many other vets my friends and family go to have highly recommended Purina pro plan.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pro is right
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical when i first bought this dog food...i mean Purina Pro? What dies that even mean. I'll telll you what though, this dog food is not kidding. Since i started feeding this to my dogs I can't empty my mailbox quick enough. Im getting offers non stop for my dogs to go pro. Football, tennis, basketball, baseball...its unreal. We've even got an offer to star in multiple movies. Highly recommend if you want your dog to be legit the bawsss.
customer_reviews.author: Joe and Jaime

customer_reviews.title: No more stomach upset for our cane Corso!
customer_reviews.text: We'd been using a much more expensive food for our 130lb cane Corso. The food was quite pricey and hard to come by. She was also experiencing GI upset daily, so we started searching for a new food. This one came recommended by our breeder. She hasn't experienced any GI upset since we started this food. Bowel movements have normalized (sorry, TMI) and she absolutely loves this food. Coat is healthy and shiny, less flatulence, and it doesn't smell as terrible as some other dog foods. It's still a bit pricey, but worth it to us considering the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie Larew

customer_reviews.title: Good food, good price, easy transition
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that I have a HIGH maintenance dog- Belgium Malinois Did a lot of research on different high performance die and good for his sensitive stomach.. We didn't go with raw because I was pregnant at the time and didn't want to deal with raw meat (pregnant and with an infant- now 2 infants), so we stuck with a kibble. Dog seems to like the food and active. We were using Pure Vita before but.. quality has been inconsistent and pricey. Get more food for the same price. Happy dog, no stomach issues and smelly poop, happy owner.
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: After dogs became comfortable with the scent - they all LOVE this.
customer_reviews.text: After dogs became comfortable with the scent - they all LOVED this. I purchased this for the first time March 2018. The food has a strong smell of fish. We have an 11 month old Doxie mix, a 13+ year Golden Mix and Great Danes they all loved it after them gave it a shot. Just mix with your pets favorite flavor of Purina and they will eat it. I will have to get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kozuch

customer_reviews.title: Busted...but wait! **update**
customer_reviews.text: Came busted open in a box that was wayyy to big. Update** giving them 5 stars now. They replaced the food for free and every bag has been great since. My dogs love it and I can see improvements in their coats, energy levels and weight :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around food
customer_reviews.text: This food was recommended by my dog's kennel owner after my German Shepherd was ill while being boarded. The suggestion from her experience was to change her food to this Pro Plan. The pieces are a medium size, and I'm also feeding her about half of her previous food - and what comes out the other end is smaller, too.
customer_reviews.author: P Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Best food for all my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have two senior beagles and a young shepherd mix. The beagles, although will eat ANYTHING, have sensitive stomachs. In fact, I first bought this because the new thing with grain free was making them really, really sick. I'm talking projectile black and bloody diarrhea and vomiting. Since they are healthy for their age, I narrowed it down to the food. But having a young dog, I was hoping for a food for all ages. BINGO! Everybody is happy, healthy, and doing soooo well. My oldest beagle just turned 16. The fact that there is a much smaller amount of poop tells me that there are indeed less fillers and more nutrition for my babies. Thank you Purina!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Murphy

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff, and they won't be given anything else. If you have a performance or athletic dog this is the food for them. Neither one really has gas eating this food, and for my 85lb Doberman, that's practically a miracle. My lab has tons of drive and energy to retrieve birds all day in the muck and mire of swamps. Granted I only tried two other dog foods with her, but this stuff is the best and Amazon has the best price especially when you subscribe.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas J Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nutritional value
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old dog acts like he is 2. My 2 year old dog is happier, my 7 year old girls are so happy. Since I changed my dog's food, thier hair is softer, grows faster and easier to manage. All of my dogs feel better and are more energetic. The cost is more but for thr results, i would pay more if i could. The store brand i used to use cost less per bag but they would eat more than now. I think, cost wise, my dogs eat less so im sure the price is about the same actually. I will never go back to the old brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rozars Justice Novels, Angie Yturbe-Rozar

customer_reviews.title: Dog Chow for Champions
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't love it, but our Frenchies do. The "no grains" chicken and egg formula provides lots of protein for good growth and maintenance through all life stages. This is the chow dog champions in the prestige show events eat and your pets deserve.
customer_reviews.author: W. K. Macallister

customer_reviews.text: This is the 30/20 formula. Anyone with high energy sport dogs, that have trouble keeping weight on, this is for you. Some of us are starting to suspect that the 20/16 formula that uses brown rice is causing some stomach flora imbalance problems.
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: Not shippable by Rural Route carriers!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was recommended by the breeder of our new Standard Poodle puppy - - and our current Poodle has transitioned to it as well. Both seem to like this food - and that’s all one can ask really. BUT - - if Amazon uses the USPS for “last mile” delivery in your vicinity, BE AWARE - - that 40 pounds of dead weight inside a box is beyond the capacity of most rural carriers to handle. I had to go pick up my latest shipment from the Post Office myself.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W.

customer_reviews.title: Well, I don't love it, but our lab does.
customer_reviews.text: Am I allowed to say Gone with the Wind, as in bye bye canine flatulence? Dog had trouble with gas with other food, but the Purina Pro Plan set her gut straight. She does not gnaw on her paws with this, her coat looks very glossy and no skin flakes, so I think there's no allergy problem with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzrob

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has a problem with luxation of the patella (the knee cap slips out of place once in a while). Our vet recommended switching to this food plus glucosamine supplement before deciding on surgical intervention. it has been about six weeks since the switch and we have seen clear improvement in the frequency of luxation. We are cautiously optimistic but the food seems to have helped so far. And the dog likes it!
customer_reviews.author: ippowus

customer_reviews.title: Using to help senior gain weight.
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to keep/add weight into my 14 yr old Lab. I believe he is gaining slightly but is maintaining, for sure. I needed to change up his macros as regular senior dog foods have a lot more fiber than he needed. It's more expensive than other dog food but this is my friend and he's worth it. I will update with progress.
customer_reviews.author: BeckJ

customer_reviews.title: Bugs living inside
customer_reviews.text: Got this food very quickly, but when I finally got to opening it after a few days, it turned out to have bugs living and crawling all around and in the food.
customer_reviews.author: Matt T

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend by our vet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this food for my German Shepherd. He has been on some kind of Pro Plan food since he was weaned and we have never had an issue. Purina Pro Plan comes very highly recommended by our vet. It is one of the only foods out there that hasn't been recalled due to cancer causing agents. The only downfall that I have found is that it makes my dogs breath smell a bit. Other than that, awesome food. I recommend it to all my family and friends who own dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lil' Cajun Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect for our puppy and our older dog too. They both eat out of each other’s bowls all the time, trying to keep an older dog away from puppy food or a puppy from adult food, is impossible. I love that it is for all stages. My dogs love this food. They even prefer it to some brands of wet food.
customer_reviews.author: PickyCat

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Don’t count one he delivery time.
customer_reviews.text: This food is great! I have a German Shorthaired Pointer and an English Setter and hunt them both regularly. This food has been wonderful. I only rated this as 3 because delivery has come days late 3 out of the 6 times that I have ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Rummell

customer_reviews.title: This is the best performance dog food on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best performance dog food on the market. I have tried other brands that are comparable, but none quite as good as Pro Plan. I feed three bird dog english setters and these dogs are worked fairly rigorously. Dogs coats keep great and the ingredients are essentials. Minimal waste as compared to cheaper brands where grain is the main ingredient. It is extremely expensive which is why I don't give it four stars and I do sometimes change between brands when the cost factor starts to bother me again or during the off season.
customer_reviews.author: KY Grouse Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes Cheap is Not Better, We're so Glad We Purchased This Again!!
customer_reviews.text: We tried to take the cheap way out and decided to buy cheap pet food. Our Australian Shepherd's coat was not as soft and luxurious and such on that cheap food. She started passing gas the past few months, enough to clear out a room, so we decided to go back to this brand that she was raised on, and I haven't smelled her stank butt since!
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very picky with extreme allergies and I must tell you she loves the food, the minute we got it through Amazon she started jumping up and down on the bag LOL not only has it been a lifesaver for her pickiness oh, it has made her fur feel like cotton! I recommended dog food. She is a 6 year old pitbull and this has been the only food that she has enjoyed like this since she was six months old
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Dieguez

customer_reviews.title: Price increase too steep
customer_reviews.text: After quite a bit of research I settled on this food for our 3 dog family. I transitioned them into the change in diet, and all went well. All 3 really loved it! I was delighted, at least until I went to reorder and discovered a $7.00 per bag price increase. I am committed to caring for my buddies, but I have to operate within a budget. Sadly, I have chosen to go with a different dog food and am once again in the transition process. Very frustrating experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What show dog owners and breeders recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dog's breeder is also a show judge. Both she and my vet recommended this dog food for my doberman. I also use the Pro Plan Bright Mind for my 8 year old 11 pound dog. Like my vet said, dog food manufacturers change ownership and you never know who you can trust. Purina does all the dog food testing and can be trusted.
customer_reviews.author: Dobe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Skin problems gone!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old German Shepherd loves this food and it made all of his skin issues disappear! My 6 month old golden doodle also loves it! It works great because they Always want to eat of of the same bowl and this food is for all stages of life!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Zmia

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed this bag should have been donated or discounted
customer_reviews.text: Unacceptable!! I order this place very month and this is the very first time I received a bag that was opened and taped back up. This is dog food. I wouldn’t eat it if this were my own food. Who knows what got into it. But I’m stuck using it bc we are out of food and I’m hoping the food is ok at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Tango

customer_reviews.title: Best food for dogs
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended 30/20 dog food years ago for my dogs. Then they came out with grain free and I have never gone back to any other foods. It is dark and rich looking and well received by both my Pomeranian and Black lab mix. My black lab wasn’t prone to skin reactions with foods and even that wild blue stuff wasn’t good to her. As long as they don’t change—I will always use this food.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.TeaTime

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Lab and German Shorthair Pointer LOVE PURINA
customer_reviews.text: Love this food. We have always had our chocolate lab on this food and he's a healthy happy boy. We had our German Pointer on several other food brands specifically for easy digestion for his sensitive stomach and nothing seemed to help. (He has a pretty severe bacteria imbalance where he cannot have anything but his dog food and maybe a raspberry or carrot once a month, if he has anything else he has diarrhea, puking and becomes lethargic) With this food he was actually able to eat, put on weight and not have any problems. So now both our dogs are on Purina and we will never change!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs did awesome health wise on it.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 dogs love this! I was totally against feeding it because of it being Purina but its was highly suggested by a friend. I'm glad I took the chance. All my dogs are doing awesome on it. They have shiny coats, no bad breath, poop doesnt smell overly terrible and is a good consistancy, and they scarf it down like it's the tastiest thing in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Ann Windle

customer_reviews.title: Great food for working dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding this particular dog food to several of my working dogs for years. It keeps them at an ideal body composition along with a beautiful coat. I have also noticed that I rarely have the digestive issues that I hear from other pet owners feeding other foods. This food is meant for dogs who receive a good amount of exercise and I would not recommend it for the couch potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food for GSP’s!
customer_reviews.text: I have two German Shorthair pointers and this is their food! They thrive on it! Your price is great and the shipping to my house prevents me from having to get it at local pet store where it’s about 10 dollars more
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Would continue to order this under subscribe and save except that USPS refuses to deliver to my house. They claim it’s too big, but their (USPS) website claims they would deliver to door step for less weight. I am saving myself the headache and just ordering elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: == true;

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product
customer_reviews.text: We started two of our three dogs on this dog food and the two that ate it developed bloody diarrhea within 12 hours and went into shock, requiring pet emergency care with iv fluids. We called the company to let them know and they refused to test our dog food for toxins.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Marlar

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Protein packed food for my dog who is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Protein packed food for my dog who is a Min Pin. He bulked up and looks very healthy. He seems to like it and doesn't have any issues with it. I wouldn't recommend it as a food you would always feed, maybe like once every couple of months because my dog bulked up pretty quick. We have to know buy him something to maintain his weight otherwise if I keep feeding him this one I do believe he'd become overweight. This is perfect for helping gain weight fast.
customer_reviews.author: TFamily

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Hate It.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 GSDs and a Catahoula. So we go through a ton of dog food. I can't get any of them to eat this unless they're starving or if I top it off with beef liver sprinkles. We usually get the blue pro plan bag and have had no issues, for whatever reason this once came up cheaper when I went to order so I decided to give it a try. Not again.
customer_reviews.author: KEO

customer_reviews.title: Not true PPP Sport 30/20
customer_reviews.text: This is not Purina Pro Plan Sport 30/20. Different bag, different scent, different kibble size, different kibble texture. All 9 of my dogs immediately had diarrhea from it. Very disappointed in this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DOG FOOD
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand & "variety" of Pro Plan for many years. I've never had a dog that didn't eat it without having to include additives (i.e. gravy, cheese, meat, etc.). I have fed numerous different breeds of dogs with the same satisfying results.
customer_reviews.author: LYNNEF

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved it
customer_reviews.text: Although my dogs ate this, and loved it, one developed a rash. Stopped feeding him this type, rash cleared up. Back to the chicken grain free Pro Plan formula for them both!
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I saw rave review/Adds in Sporting Dog Magazines, Yep they must get it free to Give the reviews Although it has good ratios of ingredients and wheat free, my dog did not prefer the food and it did not digest as well, their was several Cups of Fines in the bottom of the bag which is very annoying to me. Anyway I went Back to Taste of the Wild
customer_reviews.author: Nkwidaho

customer_reviews.title: Quality Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: "Dog People" in the know do not feed highly advertised inferior dog foods! No other dog food producer has the testing and manufacturing structure to equal Purina. Purina produces all levels of pet foods and their Pro Plan is what breeder's and competitors use.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: PUP SAYS WOW
customer_reviews.text: This stuff packs the meat and the heat. BOY OH BOY my britt can run with this here stuff. SHOOTEM
customer_reviews.author: Twil

customer_reviews.title: Vet Recommended, Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended this for our very active 18 mo. GSD mix. he was a pretty picky eater before giving this to him, now he literally just wants to eat out of the storage container we keep it in. He loves it! Also the price is fantastic. Win win for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: MsBlack

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Both my 15 lb French Bulldog and 40lb Blue Heeler absolutely love this product. Their gas is reduced and bowel movements are correct consistency. Sorry not trying to be gross. They both have lots of energy and this grain free is perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Biehle

customer_reviews.title: Something changed, now terrible
customer_reviews.text: Product used to be amazing used for two years, new bag my dog refused to eat and smells off. My pup otherwise has a very healthy appetite. I don't know what changed or what's wrong with this bag but she won't take a single bite.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Dog seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched my dog to this type of food and he really seems to enjoy it. Then again he also enjoys eating other animals poop so I'm not sure he's the best judge of tastiness. But as long as he's eating it I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cadez

customer_reviews.title: Great food for your best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Best dog food out there. My black lab loves it. High in protein/fat, good for a hunting dog. If you have a couch potato dog, this might not be for them. A friend has 2 English Pointers, we travel together sometimes with our dogs. His dogs preferred the Pro Plan Sport over theirs. Got him to switch and he said there was a noticeable difference in the energy level and endurance while hunting. It was contagious, the game preserve we bird hunt at changed to Pro Plan as well, a kennel that has over 40 hunting dogs. Good stuff and a cheap price on Amazon over the major retailers, and shipped to your door step!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Oats

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this dog food for my older dog.
customer_reviews.text: My elderly dog eats this and seems to enjoy it. Pieces are quite small, which is good for easy chewing. Protein is high compared to some other brands which is important for my dog to keep weight on. I gave it a 3 star rating for price as it’s quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: TronZ4

customer_reviews.title: My Pit Bull Loves This Food and Its Great Source of Protein
customer_reviews.text: My Pit Bull Loves This Food and Its Great Source of Protein . We only buy dog food where meat is the first ingredient and the other ingredients are healthy for our pet son. We've since switched foods bc of the price but we still love this food for our son.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby H.

customer_reviews.title: I ended up transitioning him to a better quality food
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is a finacky eater. He did not care for this food. He came from the breeder on this food, I ended up transitioning him to a better quality food.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great Food for performance animals.
customer_reviews.text: This is the primary food I feed Bubba, 3 month old Cardigan Corgi. It’s the same food the Dam & Sire ate. Champion animals. There’s practically no odor and I guess the it tastes okay, not that a puppy is picky. Firm stool, no vomiting, no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bottles

customer_reviews.title: Great for active dogs
customer_reviews.text: This dog food has helped my highly active lab pit mix put on some weight! She always looked skinny due to always being so active this has helped her gain weight and look more healthy! She gobbles it right up!
customer_reviews.author: kelly dillon

customer_reviews.title: Savings & Convenience
customer_reviews.text: This brand of dog food was suggested by our vet and works just great from nose to tail. Shiny coat, no digestive issues and our golden retriever never has a problem finishing off a bowl every day. We literally live 5 minutes from a national pet store chain which is handy, however when I order online from Amazon it is delivered to my front door and I save $ 7.00 a bag which sure adds up over time. Thank you Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Duncan S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Food for Sensitive Stomachs, Very Competitive Price
customer_reviews.text: We turned to this food when our lab puppy began having an upset stomach and diarrhea after eating many other brands of food. This food was recommended to us by a professional dog trainer. We were initially skeptical of the price, but when we realized our lab's stomach could handle this and I was no longer cleaning up diarrhea off of his kennel, my floor, and occasionally the walls, I was willing to pay a little more. I've called around to many local stores trying to find it cheaper than Amazon, but this is honestly the best price I can find. Plus, it gets delivered to my door. Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great food normally, but this bag was all crumbs
customer_reviews.text: We love this food, but the bag from amazon was all crumbs. Probably the shipping process, so we won't be purchasing online again.
customer_reviews.author: Neuropenguin

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's Border Collie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This chow meets the recommendations of an article posted on the AVMA (American Veterinary Medicine Association) website, so I had it sent to my daughter to try on her 1-year old male Border Collie. Happily, he much prefers it to the Science Diet chow he had been eating.
customer_reviews.author: NoseInBook

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Switched over to this food when scientists had linked pea protein to heart disease in dogs. My dogs are not sensitive to chicken and we have been using it for about 2 months now. They are excited each time we feed them and their fur coat is still super soft so I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: soccer7maniac7

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Dog = Happy Mom
customer_reviews.text: My dog (texas heeler) has en extremely sensitive stomach and does not consume any people food. I had fed him Rachel Ray dog food since he was a puppy. My friend that is a vet came to visit and mentioned that the dog food that she recommends to her patients is Purina Pro Plan. She sent me a free small bag to test from her office. And, it was amazing. We saw a change in his behavior within 3 days. This is the only food that keeps my dog healthy with a regular "schedule". Get this for your pup to keep him healthy and you happy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bull

customer_reviews.title: Amazon box is way too big
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine. The box from Amazon is huge, the bag is 1/5 the size of the box. I will absolutely switch to Chewy for dog food if i get another delivery with a huge box. So wasteful and not environmentally responsible.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian B.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to Open!
customer_reviews.text: This is good-great food if you have a dog like mine that needs to put in 3-5 miles a day, and I have been using it for some time now with great satisfaction. There used to be a clever "pinch and pull" tab that reliably and easily opened the bag without tearing. This most recent bag, however, was missing that feature and I literally had to saw the bag open which was messy in and of itself and, obviously, doesn't allow re-sealing. If this is a package design change rather than a one-time flaw, I will have to abandon this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas F.

customer_reviews.title: German Shepard
customer_reviews.text: We have a two German Shepard’s and they like the food. I can’t ask how it tastes but they eat it! Doesn’t smell great but I mean— it’s dog food.. One big bag per dog lasts them each a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They both seem to like the food but rarely do they eat the food ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of my labs eat this food year round. I throttle back on their portions in the spring and summer and basically give them all they can eat during hunting season. Their weights never fluctuate more than 5 pounds from their "normal" weight. They both seem to like the food but rarely do they eat the food immediately when I put it in front of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff o

customer_reviews.title: Great product buy this one for the money w/quality
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old German shepherd loves this. I bought this as a weight gain product for her and since this product offers 475 calories per serving at a very low price point with 30% protein, I have found this brand blended to be of high quality just as much for any double priced other niche brands
customer_reviews.author: Gone247

customer_reviews.title: Great quality food
customer_reviews.text: Great quality food, good ingredients. Expensive but worth it in my opinion. Coat is great, engergy level is great. Check out Wiley the Weimeraner on Instigram.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Came late, made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: This food came in late which is understandable due to COVID but it gave my dog diarrhea which is unacceptable. I appreciate how I didn't need to return the item when I requested a refund but it doesn't change the fact that this product is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food and my Vet agrees
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the Salmon & Rice. His vet told us this was the best dog food choice. I have a Golden Labrador Service Dog and my responsibility is to keep him healthy so he can do his job.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Underrated and Very Very Good
customer_reviews.text: After trying just about every holistic brand going, we are feeding this to our terrier teenager as her exclusive dry food (she gets fresh and canned as well). She loves it and her digestion (fecal output) on it is consistently great. If you've tried other "super premium" foods and gotten messy poops for your trouble, overcome any prejudices you may have about "good" ingredients and try this. You'll be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: channeledbymodem

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and delivered in a few days. My golden retriever loves this as the breeder started him in the brand/formula. The cost is very reasonable compared to top competitor brands and in my opinion, better quality for the price. His coat is healthy, full, no stomach or allergy issues.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: False subscription pricing!
customer_reviews.text: Food is good but do not trust the price! I signed up fir a subscription and it still charged me $49 instead of the discounted rate.
customer_reviews.author: C Garrard

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My lab LOVES this food. Expensive, but worth it. I immediately noticed a difference in his energy level and his coat quality. He is a very active 2 year old and I wanted something to support his energy.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Great, well balanced dog food for active adult dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My AKC Champion Doberman Stella eats Purina Pro Plan Performance Sport on a regular basis. Her coat is shiny and she is healthy and in great condition. Stella has been eating Purina Pro Plan Performance since transferring from puppy food. She ate it throughout her pregnancy and is eating it as she nurses her litter of puppies.
customer_reviews.author: ELM

customer_reviews.title: My breeder recommended this to me about 20 years ago
customer_reviews.text: My breeder recommended this to me about 20 years ago. We started with proplan puppy to dog regurlar proplan chicken and egg grain free. They do not make it any more and switched to proplan sport grain free. I would never switch brands. My godlens have been healthy since being puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M. Stout

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Vet
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by vet for purity and quality. Dog has problems with anal glands and this plus Honest Dog treats seem to work well. Only other treat is cheese.
customer_reviews.author: DKK

customer_reviews.title: Quality food.  I've fed it for years and have no plans to change.
customer_reviews.text: I've fed Purina ProPlan Sport for years -- even to my puppies. I like the salmon formula because I feel like it contains more omega 3 for my dogs' skin and coat. The dogs have shiny coats, bright eyes, good muscle tone, and they like it. I recommend this for any active dog below the age of 9, when I start feeding ProPlan Bright Mind.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Kibble.
customer_reviews.text: This is top notch kibble. My hunting dog loves it and it has improved his stools. It's crazy that you can buy something this big and heavy on Amazon and have it shipped to you cheaper than you can buy it locally.
customer_reviews.author: NAK

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs who need it
customer_reviews.text: I was becoming more active with my female Vizsla so I put her on this food but it was too much for her as she stayed active but gained weight. Then I got a male Vizsla and Had to get weight on him. Fed him over recommended amount till he got to an ideal weight now he maintains on the daily amount. Great formula for high metabolism. Not all dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Food! Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: Our furr babies are in bn l oi ve with this kibble! It arrives every two months and I never have to worry about running low. Thank you!!! Great service! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: C M Hetchler

customer_reviews.title: Border Collie Rocket Fuel
customer_reviews.text: I have two 18 month old border collies. While not engaged in actual sports, they are VERY energetic dogs. They really like this stuff and it seems to keep them racing along at 5000 rpm. Hopefully, my house and yard will survive.
customer_reviews.author: McDaniken

customer_reviews.title: Great food for sporting dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing our dog eats....she is a hunting dog so her diet is very important to us. Purina has been her food since she was able to eat solid food 👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jason R McCutcheon

customer_reviews.title: This is what they feed the dogs at Leader Dog For The Blind in Michigan
customer_reviews.text: And that’s why I continued with it. Don’t want to get too disgusting, but her stool is always the same consistency, and very easy to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: jacklyn h. meeks

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak any more highly of this dog food. I’ve been through 5 different types and Purina Pro Plan is by far the one that agrees with both my dogs stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McGlone

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Purina is great food and this may be their best. Top food used by highest performing field trial retrievers in this country. That says it all.
customer_reviews.author: robert b mirmow

customer_reviews.title: Quality products
customer_reviews.text: Our Aussie is 2 years old and has been on Pro Plan Sport since a pup. Great product but the last 4 shipping containers were all broken up.
customer_reviews.author: RdHogg

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a highly recommend food for dogs and we have been feeding it to our picky Golden doodles for years. They love this food and I know we're feeding them a high quality product. I also love that we can buy it on Amazon in 50 lb. bags without having to drive to the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Lhighfield

customer_reviews.title: High quality food for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the formula and the Kcal content. Perfect food for my house decor dogs and my performance dog! Amazing quality. My dogs have amazing coat quality and perfectly regular poops.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great food for hunting dogs
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of Pro Plan varieties, but this is the specific formula recommended to me by people from Purina who know hard-working hunting dogs. I have a female German Shorthair Pointer (GSP) and she does really well on this food. She can hunt hard up to 5 or 6 hours a day and she's still pacing around in the house or hotel at the end of the day. Highly recommend this formula.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Orrin Strand

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn't like it!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't like it at all...I will revert back to the weight control kind which was out of stock when I was shopping for dog food.
customer_reviews.author: samy bekka

product_meta.title: Purina Pro Plan Sport, Energy & Vitality Support, High Protein Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description:
Style:Performance 30/20| Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:37.5 lb. BagHelp your dog excel with the fine-tuned nutrition of Purina Pro Plan SPORT Performance 30/20 All Life Stages dry dog food. Designed for active dogs, this food appeals to owners of sporting dogs and canine athletes. The recipe concentrates nutrition in ways that help optimize oxygen metabolism for more endurance. This formula contains a blend of 30% protein and 20% fat to help care for your dog's metabolic needs, as well as to help him maintain strong muscles. Amino acids nourish your dog's muscles, especially in those moments after your dog has been working hard. This recipe features chicken as the #1 ingredient and gives your dog the protein and nutrients he needs for his busy lifestyle. EPA and glucosamine help support joint health and mobility to make moving as easy as possible. The antioxidant-rich recipe nourishes his immune system and helps defend it against free radicals. Try this Pro Plan SPORT for 100% complete and balanced nutrition to show your dog how much you care.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
We believe every dog is capable of amazing things. Purina(R) Pro Plan(R) is dedicated to helping dogs of all activity levels excel through performance nutrition and expert resources--allowing your dog to reach his full potential.
feature_bullets: One (1) 37.5 pound Bag Purina Pro Plan High Protein Dry Dog Food; SPORT Performance 30/20 Formula
Features real chicken as the Number 1 ingredient
Contains 30 percent protein and 20 percent fat to help fuel metabolic needs and maintain lean muscle; Calorie Content: 1928 kcal/pounds
Amino acids help nourish muscles, including during the crucial time immediately following exercise
EPA and glucosamine help support joint health and mobility

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
